gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 124, Nets 108
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder won their fourth consecutive game as they defeated the Nets, 124-108. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander led the Thunder with 24 points, four rebounds and six assists.  Mikal Bridges recorded 22 points, seven rebounds and seven assists for the Nets. The Thunder improve to 22-9 with the win and the Nets fall to 15-18 with the loss.
